titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 769) terminating a Select Investigative Panel of the Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Providing for the consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 769) terminating a Select Investigative Panel of the Committee on Energy and Commerce.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.Res. 769 (Terminates the Select Investigative Panel of the Committee on Energy and Commerce).
